alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 7:22PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Okaloosa County through 715 PM CDT... At 622 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Valparaiso, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Niceville, Destin, Eglin AFB, Valparaiso, Lake Lorraine and Shalimar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
